name: The Colored Moth
description:
Made in less than 24 hours for Bitsy gamejam.

Arrow keys to move and talk. 

It is a narrative game so its good to talk to others characters. White sprites are interactive objects/characters.

The game is inspired by true events (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P2rHGg2akpw).

Game by Ahmed Khalifa. Edited by Christopher Michaels. Inspired by Ahmed Saker.
